positive_examples: This is an example of excited atom.
The excited atom demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed excited atom in this context.
A typical case of excited atom would involve these features.
The concept of excited atom applies here.
An atom in which one or more electrons occupy higher energy levels than in the ground state.
negative_examples: This is an example of free atom, not excited atom.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: FreeAtom, or other types of Atom

definition: An atom with one or more electrons in higher energy states than ground state.
